channel.title: ja signaling on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in ja signaling on funPlantGenes

item.title: AaSEP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Aannua10729S694100 Gene Symbol: AaSEP1 Gene Name: AaSEPALLATA1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Identified a MADS-box transcription factor, AaSEPALLATA1 (AaSEP1), that positively regulates GST initiation.

item.title: CaASR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaASR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaASR1 promotes salicylic acid- but represses jasmonic acid-dependent signaling to enhance the resistance of Capsicum annuum to bacterial wilt by modulating CabZIP63.

item.title: CaCIPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA01g29520 Gene Symbol: CaCIPK3 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 3 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The CaCIPK3 gene positively regulates drought tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CaLOX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana03g000103 Gene Symbol: CaLOX2 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 2 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Involvement of sweet pepper CaLOX2 in jasmonate-dependent induced defence against Western flower thrips.

item.title: CsMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ciclev10019730m Gene Symbol: CsMYC2 Gene Name: Genome: Citrus sinensis cv.

item.title: CsWAKL08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs9g14540 Gene Symbol: CsWAKL08 Gene Name: Wall-associated receptor-like kinase 8 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsWAKL08, a pathogen-induced wall-associated receptor-like kinase in sweet orange, confers resistance to citrus bacterial canker via ROS control and JA signaling.

item.title: Fir1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc12g099830 Gene Symbol: Fir1 Gene Name: Fls2/Fls3-interacting receptor-like cytoplasmic kinase 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Identified the tomato Fls2/Fls3-interacting receptor-like cytoplasmic kinase 1 (Fir1) protein that is involved in PTI triggered by flagellin perception.

item.title: FvJAZ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g09690 Gene Symbol: FvJAZ12 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain 12 Genome: Fragaria_vesca.

item.title: FvLOX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g34960 Gene Symbol: FvLOX3 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: FvMPK6 phosphorylates FvJAZ12 at the amino acid residues S179 and T183 adjacent to the PY residues, thereby attenuating its nuclear accumulation and relieving its repression for FvMYC2, which acts to control the expression of lipoxygenase 3 (FvLOX3), an important gene involved in JA biosynthesis and a diverse array of cellular metabolisms.

item.title: FvMPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g00480 Gene Symbol: FvMPK6 Gene Name: mitogen protein kinase 6 Genome: Fragaria_vesca.

item.title: FvMYC2

item.title: GbWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Our data suggest that GbWRKY1 is a critical regulator mediating the plant defense-to-development transition during V.

item.title: Gh4CL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gh4CL3 Gene Name: Cotton 4-coumarate-CoA ligase 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton 4-coumarate-CoA ligase 3 (Gh4CL3) enhanced plant resistance to Verticillium dahliae by promoting jasmonic acid signaling-mediated vascular lignification and metabolic flux.

item.title: GhGPA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhGPA Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A cotton G-protein Î±-subunit-encoding gene (GhGPA) was isolated from Verticillium wilt-resistant Gossypium hirsutum (upland cotton) cv.

item.title: MdBIM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000143208 Gene Symbol: MdBIM1 Gene Name: BES1-INTERACTING MYC-LIKE PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Brassinosteroid signaling regulator BIM1 (MdBIM1) integrates brassinolide and jasmonic acid signaling during cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000452772 Gene Symbol: MdJAZ1 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) proteins MdJAZ1 and MdJAZ2 negatively modulate MdABI4-improved cold tolerance in apple by interacting with the MdABI4 protein.

item.title: PeOST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G084100 Gene Symbol: PeOST1 Gene Name: OPEN STOMATA1 Genome: Species: Populus euphratica Functional Descriptions: A yeast two-hybrid assay was performed using PeOST1 as bait and a nucleus-localized factor, JASMONATE ZIM-domain protein 2 (PeJAZ2), was found to participate in MeJA signaling by interacting with PeOST1.

item.title: PtoERF15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.008G166100 Gene Symbol: PtoERF15 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: The AP2/ERF transcription factor PtoERF15 confers drought tolerance via JA-mediated signaling in Populus.

item.title: PtoMYC2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G092200 Gene Symbol: PtoMYC2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Here, we identified and characterized an osmotic stress-induced ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 (PtoERF15) and its target, PtoMYC2b, which was involved in mediating vessel size, density, and cell wall thickness in response to drought in Populus tomentosa.

item.title: RhCCCH12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhCCCH12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Two transcription factors, RhERF005 and RhCCCH12, regulate rose resistance to Botrytis cinerea by modulating cytokinin levels.

item.title: RhERF005
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhERF005 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Two transcription factors, RhERF005 and RhCCCH12, regulate rose resistance to Botrytis cinerea by modulating cytokinin levels.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc05g014160 Gene Symbol: Sl-RGS1 Gene Name: G protein signaling 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: RGS1 negatively regulates disease resistance and is required for glucose-enhanced defense under low light.

item.title: SlWRKY45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g067360 Gene Symbol: SlWRKY45 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlWRKY45 interacts with jasmonate-ZIM domain proteins to negatively regulate defense against the root-knot nematode Meloidogyne incognita in tomato.

item.title: VvJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvJAZ2 Gene Name: JA signaling suppressor Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Determined that VvWRKY5 regulated the JA response by directly binding to the promoters of VvJAZ2 (a JA signaling suppressor) and VvMYC2 (a JA signaling activator), thereby inhibiting and activating the transcription of VvJAZ2 and VvMYC2, respectively.
